verbs.description: [V: Responding] [ARG1: to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as " Animal Assad "] , [ARG0: the Syrian leader] said : " What you say is what you are " . Trump called Assad an animal after a suspected poison gas attack on a rebel - held town near Damascus in April .

[R-ARG0: Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as " Animal Assad "] , [ARG0: the Syrian leader] [V: said] : " [ARG1: What you say is what you are " . Trump called Assad an animal after a suspected poison gas attack on a rebel - held town near Damascus in April] .

Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as " Animal Assad " , the Syrian leader said : " [ARG1: What] [ARG0: you] [V: say] is what you are " . Trump called Assad an animal after a suspected poison gas attack on a rebel - held town near Damascus in April .

Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as " Animal Assad " , the Syrian leader said : " [ARG1: What you say] [V: is] [ARG2: what you are] " . Trump called Assad an animal after a suspected poison gas attack on a rebel - held town near Damascus in April .
